long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Read aloud with premium voices of any news, articles from any websites using AI!

🌿 Suitable use cases 
1️⃣ Commuter Buddy.
You are in a busy commute where it is hard to read article or news. BudGPT will summarized the news for you. You just need to listen to it.
2️⃣ Traffic Jam Buddy.
Don't waste your precious time just to see the traffic jam. Listen to the latest news with BudGPT.
3️⃣ Learning Buddy.
BudGPT can help you explain, summarized, take key points of any text directly on any webpages without the need to switching to ChatGPT website. You just need to sit and relax.
4️⃣ Help you understand article, news or any webpages content.
5️⃣ Help you compose reply an email.

🌿 What can BudGPT do?
1️⃣ Read a summarized an article, blog, news for you!
2️⃣ Explain specific word in the web page.
3️⃣ Get key points from a web page.
4️⃣ Translate a page into your own languages.
5️⃣ Understand an article.

Define your own prompts, access them from any webpage (by right-clicking on a text selection), and listen to the response. Alternatively, you can click the speaker button in the corner to execute a prompt with the text of the page as your prompt parameter.

This can be useful for learning new things, studying, and you can also define custom prompts for kids 👌

📱 How to Use Android:
1️⃣ Install BudGPT chrome extension. For Android, you can also install it in the Kiwi Browser.
2️⃣ Create a ChatGPT login session in your browser. BudGPT will reuse your session. After logging in, you can close the ChatGPT tab.
3️⃣ In the BudGPT option page, save a valid BudGPT token. You can try this token BUDGPT07 for free.
4️⃣ Open any web page. BudGPT will place a speaker button in the bottom right corner.
5️⃣ Tap the button to listen to the summary of the page.
6️⃣ What's next? Configure ChatGPT prompts as much as you need!

💻 How to Use Desktop:
1️⃣ Install BudGPT chrome extension.
2️⃣  Create a ChatGPT login session in your browser. BudGPT will reuse your session. After logging in, you can close the ChatGPT tab.
3️⃣ In the BudGPT option page, save a valid BudGPT token. You can try this token BUDGPT07 for free.
4️⃣ Open any web page. Select some text in the page, right click on it and send it to ChatGPT or tap the speaker button to have a page summary for you.
5️⃣ What's next? Configure ChatGPT prompts as much as you need!

📦 Variables for your prompts:
📒 {text}: Your text selection.
📒 {page}: The entire text content from the page.
📒 {date}: Current date
📒 {time}: Current time
📒 {day}: Current day name

🗳️ Features:
✅ Right-click on any text on the web page and send it to ChatGPT based on your own prompt selections.
✅ Right-click on the page and send the text content of the page to ChatGPT based on your own prompt selections.
✅ We've placed a speaker button in the bottom right of the page. You can customize the prompt. Whenever you click on the button, it will send your prompt to ChatGPT with the text content of the page. My favorite prompt is to summarizing the page!

⌨️ Customization:
✅ Unlimited prompts for the context menu
✅ Premium voice-over

📣 Sometimes it needs several days for a new version to be available in the chrome webstore. In case you are in a hurry, you can always get the latest version with bug fixing on our official website.
